title: MY CLUB IS BUSTED!!!!
body: Hi, i am a NA player playing on the NA server, and for the past 3 weeks they club i was in was not showing in anyways. My friend who is still in the club sees me as offline, when i am actually on. The club name is "FT boiz" and  and club tag is "FTbo1" if anyone knows how to solve this, pls help. Appreciated!!! :D

replies.body:
We're still resolving the remaining clubs issues one-on-one, so I recommend submitting a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your club name and tag as **Allenah** mentioned.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Try submitting a ticket to Riot. My friend had an issue where he was the leader of a club, but he wasn't in it despite it showing that the club was still there and he was in fact in it. He submitted a ticket and had it resolved fairly quickly.
